thread.title: 12 Videos: America’s Cup Series In Bermuda
thread.title_full: 12 Videos: America’s Cup Series In Bermuda

author: M
title: 12 Videos: America’s Cup Series In Bermuda
text:
October 19, 2015 | 0 Comments 
Artemis Racing from Sweden claimed a victory in the final Louis Vuitton America’s Cup World Series event of the year, overcoming a crash with an umpire boat to claim the series victory. 
After racing was abandoned on Saturday due to lack of wind, three races were scheduled for Sunday with double points on offer, with the on-water activities supplemented by a concert, event village and more. 
Speaking after the event concluded, Russell Coutts the CEO of the America’s Cup Event Authority, said: “We’ve seen Bermuda come out and put its arms around this event and I think it shows this is going to be a great event in 2017.” 
You can view photos from the Opening Ceremony here , photos of the Event Village here , photos from the America’s Cup Jam concert here , photos of the racing on October 18 here , photos of the prize presentation here , photos of the Gombeys here , and all our coverage of the America’s Cup here.
